roleset.name: tell a little joke
roleset.note: QUIP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'quip' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with say. (from quip.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Yesterday, Mr. Matthews, now a consultant with the Stamford, Conn., firm Matthews& Johnston, quipped, ``I think he'll be very good at that new job.
example.arg: Mr. Matthews, now a consultant with the Stamford, Conn., firm Matthews& Johnston,
I think he'll be very good at that new job
